name: Cat Paper Scissors
description:
Was originally meant for Mini Jam 68 (theme: Sleep), but I wasn't able to finish the coding at that time, and it was a couple weeks before I could get the thing to export properly, even without making it fit the jam's limitations. 

But, here is "Rock Paper Scissors" with Sleeping Cats.

Art: Enjaku
Code: Rainsong

Software:
Art: Aseprite and Affinity Designer
Code: Unity
